name: Boarderline
tagline: An intranet for CCGS boarding built using Ruby on Rails
body:
# BoarderLine
BoarderLine is a work in progress, and when it is finished it will be an intranet for CCGS boarding.

## Readme
You can read the full readme file [here](https://github.com/davblayn/boarderline/blob/master/README.md)
